articles.title: Why the Miami Heat are going even further with their stunning new 'Vice' uniforms
articles.description: The Heat's popular "Vice" uniforms get a colorful makeover unlike any other NBA jersey.
articles.content: In the fall of 2018, three Miami Heat officials gathered at Nike's headquarters in Portland, Oregon, to discuss the Heat's city edition uniforms for the 2020-21 season -- intended then as the season the Heat would move away from its popular "Vice" al... [380 chars]

articles.title: NJ bill to legalize marijuana includes 'social equity' tax
articles.description: New Jersey's push to legalize weed includes a "social equity" tax that would benefit communities of color disproportionately affected by drug laws.
articles.content:
The push to legalize recreational weed in New Jersey includes a new “social equity” tax that would benefit communities of color disproportionately affected by drug laws.

articles.title: 4 Contenders for the Next New Jersey Devils Captain
articles.description: Travis Zajac, Kyle Palmieri, Nico Hischier and P.K. Subban all have the potential to be the next New Jersey Devils captain.
articles.content: The New Jersey Devils have been without a captain since they traded Andy Greene at the 2020 Trade Deadline. Now without one for almost a full year since they last played a game, the team has a few options for who could wear the “C” next. Nico Hischie... [4058 chars]

articles.title: Climate crisis to triple flooding threat for low-income US homes by 2050
articles.description: A new study has found that affordable housing in New York, Massachusetts, New Jersey and California will be at particular risk
articles.content:

articles.title: Ivanka Trump: Zukunft in der Provinz? In der Heimat-Metropole ist Trumps Tochter plötzlich unerwünscht
articles.description: Für Ivanka Trump ist die Zeit als „First Daughter“ der USA bald beendet. Doch in ihrer Heimatstadt New York könnte sie unerwünscht sein. Gerüchte ranken sich um ein Anwesen in New Jersey.
